sub_concepts.name: Sun
sub_concepts.definition: The star at the center of the solar system

sub_concepts.name: Planets
sub_concepts.definition: Celestial bodies that revolve around the Sun in elliptical orbits

sub_concepts.name: Asteroids
sub_concepts.definition: Small rocky bodies that orbit the Sun

sub_concepts.name: Comets
sub_concepts.definition: Icy bodies that orbit the Sun and have a tail when close to the Sun

sub_concepts.name: Dwarf Planets
sub_concepts.definition: Celestial bodies similar to planets but have not cleared their neighboring region of other debris
